sentence.Network_en: His Utopia is not a chimerical commonwealth but a practical improvement on what already exists.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的乌托邦不是空想的联邦,而是对那些已经存在的联邦事实上的改进.

sentence.Network_en: Most interpret the information from the victims as chimerical thinking.
sentence.Network_cn: 大多数来自于受害者的解释是被当作空想.

sentence.Network_en: This wanton exercise of this power is not a chimerical suggestion of a heated brain.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种不负责任地行使这个权力的行为不是我头脑发热凭空捏造出来的.

means.word_mean: 2. produced by a wildly fanciful imagination;
